post.title: 統計基礎
post.content:
統計基礎

記号

記号 意味
EEE 期待値
μ\muμ 平均期待値
s2s^2s2 標本不偏分散
V()V()V() 分散
rrr 相関係数
σ2\sigma ^2σ2 母分散

1次元データ

  • 分散 (variance)
S2=1n{(x1−xˉ)2+(x2−xˉ)2+⋯+(xn−xˉ)2}S^2 = \frac{1}{n}\{(x_1 - \bar{x})^2 + (x_2 - \bar{x})^2 + \cdots + (x_n - \bar{x})^2\}S2=n1​{(x1​−xˉ)2+(x2​−xˉ)2+⋯+(xn​−xˉ)2}
=1n∑(xi−xˉ)2= \frac{1}{n}\sum(x_i - \bar{x})^2=n1​∑(xi​−xˉ)2
  • 標準偏差 (standard deviation)
S=S2S = \sqrt{S^2}S=S2​

2次元データ

  • 共分散 (covariance)
Cxy=∑(xi−xˉ)(yi−yˉ)nC_{xy} = \frac{\sum(x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{n}Cxy​=n∑(xi​−xˉ)(yi​−yˉ​)​
=E[(X−μX)(Y−μY)]= E[(X-\mu_X)(Y - \mu_Y)]=E[(X−μX​)(Y−μY​)]
=E[XY]−E[X]E[Y]= E[XY] - E[X]E[Y]=E[XY]−E[X]E[Y]
  • 相関係数 (correlation coefficient)
rxy=∑(xi−xˉ)(yi−yˉ)∑(xi−xˉ)2/n∑(yi−yˉ)2/nr_{xy} = \frac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sqrt{\sum(x_i-\bar{x})^2 / n}\sqrt{\sum(y_i - \bar{y})^2/n}}rxy​=∑(xi​−xˉ)2/n​∑(yi​−yˉ​)2/n​∑(xi​−xˉ)(yi​−yˉ​)​
=∑(xi−xˉ)(yi−yˉ)∑(xi−xˉ)2∑(yi−yˉ)2= \frac{\sum(x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sqrt{\sum(x_i - \bar{x})^2}\sqrt{\sum(y_i - \bar{y})^2}}=∑(xi​−xˉ)2​∑(yi​−yˉ​)2​∑(xi​−xˉ)(yi​−yˉ​)​
=CxySxSy= \frac{C_{xy}}{S_xS_y}=Sx​Sy​Cxy​​
  • 最小二乗法での回帰直線の方程式
Y−E(Y)=rxy⋅SYSX{X−E(X)}Y - E(Y) = r_{xy}\cdot \frac{S_Y}{S_X}\{X - E(X)\}Y−E(Y)=rxy​⋅SX​SY​​{X−E(X)}
=CxySX2= \frac{C_{xy}}{S_X^2}=SX2​Cxy​​

→ 傾き rxy⋅SYSXr_{xy}\cdot \frac{S_Y}{S_X}rxy​⋅SX​SY​​ (相関係数 ✕ (Yの標準偏差)/(Xの標準偏差))
